segments.text: Hello , back already ? That was quick !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , luckily our office is just down the street .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Great . I shall also need a copy of your own ID and the Warrant Letter , you can fill in one here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Next time , you can get one from the counter over there . Or before you come in , you can download one from our website . It's really easy .
segments.speaker: S1
